Package com.platform.subscription.internal

Interface InvoiceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Invoice,UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Invoice,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Invoice,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Invoice,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Invoice,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Invoice>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Invoice,UUID>
@Repository public interface InvoiceRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Invoice,UUID>

    • findOverdueInvoices

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.status = :status AND i.dueDate < :cutoffDate") List<Invoice> findOverdueInvoices(@Param("status") Invoice.Status status, @Param("cutoffDate") Instant cutoffDate)

    • findByOrganizationIdAndDateRange

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.createdAt BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY i.createdAt DESC") List<Invoice> findByOrganizationIdAndDateRange(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("startDate") Instant startDate, @Param("endDate") Instant endDate)

    • sumPaidInvoiceAmountsByOrganization

      @Query("SELECT SUM(i.totalAmount.amount) FROM Invoice i WHERE i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.status = \'PAID\'") Long sumPaidInvoiceAmountsByOrganization(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)

    • sumPaidInvoiceAmountsByOrganizationAndDateRange

      @Query("SELECT SUM(i.totalAmount.amount) FROM Invoice i WHERE i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.status = \'PAID\' AND i.createdAt BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate") Long sumPaidInvoiceAmountsByOrganizationAndDateRange(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId, @Param("startDate") Instant startDate, @Param("endDate") Instant endDate)

    • countPaidInvoicesByOrganization

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(i) FROM Invoice i WHERE i.organizationId = :organizationId AND i.status = \'PAID\'") long countPaidInvoicesByOrganization(@Param("organizationId") UUID organizationId)

    • findInvoicesDueSoon

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.status = \'OPEN\' AND i.dueDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY i.dueDate ASC") List<Invoice> findInvoicesDueSoon(@Param("startDate") Instant startDate, @Param("endDate") Instant endDate)

    • findStaleDraftInvoices

      @Query("SELECT i FROM Invoice i WHERE i.status = \'DRAFT\' AND i.createdAt < :cutoffDate") List<Invoice> findStaleDraftInvoices(@Param("cutoffDate") Instant cutoffDate)
